Jasny\HttpMessage\GlobalEnvironmentInterface

Interface that ServerRequest or Response can interact with the global environment

    Synopsis

    interface GlobalEnvironmentInterface {
    • // methods
    • public GlobalEnvironmentInterface withGlobalEnvironment()
    • public GlobalEnvironmentInterface withoutGlobalEnvironment()
    • public boolean|null isStale()
    • public GlobalEnvironmentInterface revive()
    }

    Methods

    public

    • isStale() — The object is stale if it no longer reflects the global environment.
    • revive() — Revive a stale object
    • withGlobalEnvironment() — Return object that is synced witht the global environment.
    • withoutGlobalEnvironment() — Return object that is disconnected from the global environment
